Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.hairdryer

package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.hairdryer

Hair dryer component for the Household Energy Management project.

This software is a computer program whose purpose is to provide a basic household management systems as an example of a cyber-physical system.

This package defines a hair dryer component used in the Household Energy Management project.

  • Class
    Description
    CVMUnitTest
    The class CVMUnitTest performs unit tests on the hair dryer component.
    HairDryer
    The class HairDryer implements the hair dryer component.
    HairDryerConnector
    The class HairDryerConnector implements a connector for the HairDryerUserCI component interface.
    HairDryerImplementationI
    The interface HairDryerImplementationI defines the signatures of services service implemented by the hair dryer component.
    HairDryerImplementationI.HairDryerMode
    The enumeration HairDryerMode describes the operation modes of the hair dryer.
    HairDryerImplementationI.HairDryerState
    The enumeration HairDryerState describes the operation states of the hair dryer.
    HairDryerInboundPort
    The class HairDryerInboundPort implements an inbound port for the HairDryerUserCI component interface.
    HairDryerOutboundPort
    The class HairDryerOutboundPort implements an outbound port for the HairDryerUserCI component interface.
    HairDryerTester
    The class HairDryerTester implements a component performing tests for the class HairDryer as a BCM component.
    HairDryerUserCI
    The component interface HairDryerUserCI defines the services a hair dryer component offers and that can be required from it.
